summary.title: Assignment 01 - CYSE 587
summary.description: Disaster response system utilizing MQTT communication protocol via drones as brokers.

data.name:
Central 
MQTT Broker
data.description: Central Broker receives data from all drones. Is connected to Python Subscribe Client, publishing received data which will be processed and forwarded to the SQL database.

data.name: SQL DB
data.description: SQL Database holds data on survivors, including location and status.

data.name:
User
Interface
data.description: It is through the CMC and the Grafana Dashboard that the Dispatch Operator will review the rescue data and determine which survivors will require immediate assistance. Search and Rescue Operators will also submit reports on their actions that can be reviewed post operation.

data.name:
Affected 
Individual
(Untrusted)
data.description: Survivors of the disaster event will utilize an Android rescue app to send basic message via MQTT.

data.name:
CMC Dispatch
Operator
(Trusted)
data.description: The Dispatch Operator will determine areas and individuals who need immediate assistance and will send out Search and Rescue teams as needed.

data.name:
Receive 
MQTT
Message
data.description: Received data is converted to SQL format and persists them in a database.

data.name:
Bridge Broker
Relay Drone
data.description: Drones will patrol the area of operation and act as bridge brokers, intercepting messages from survivors and forwarding them to other drones until the message reaches the central broker.
